description: Try our easy to follow Nectarines With Whipped Cheese & Honey Walnuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grilled fruit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Dec 2019,Summer,Quick & easy dessert,Stone fruit,Halal,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian
name: Nectarines With Whipped Cheese & Honey Walnuts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven grill to medium-high. Line baking tray with baking paper. Place nectarine, cut-sides up, onto tray. Brush with some honey and season with a little sea salt. Add walnuts to side of tray.
Grill for 3 minutes or until edges of nectarines have browned and walnuts are toasted.
In a medium bowl, mash goat’s cheese with a fork. Add 1 tbs oil and milk and whisk until smooth.
Combine remaining oil and thyme in a small bowl.
Drizzle nectarines with remaining honey, thyme oil and scatter over walnuts. Serve with cheese mixture.
